de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference

Class AminoAcidChangeNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference.AminoAcidChangeNormalizer

  • public final class AminoAcidChangeNormalizer
extends Object
    Helper for normalizing changes in amino acid sequences.
    Author:
    Manuel Holtgrewe

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AminoAcidChange normalizeDeletion(String ref, AminoAcidChange change)
      Normalize deletion AminoAcidChange for amino acid string Return change if it is not a clean deletion.

      Shift insertion AminoAcidChange to the right in WT AA sequence.
      static AminoAcidChange truncateAltAfterStopCodon(AminoAcidChange change)

    • Method Detail

      • truncateAltAfterStopCodon

        public static AminoAcidChange truncateAltAfterStopCodon(AminoAcidChange change)
        Search for stop codon in change.alt and truncate afterwards.
        Parameters:
        change - the AminoAcidChange to normalize
        Returns:
        normalized AminoAcidChange

      • normalizeDeletion

        public static AminoAcidChange normalizeDeletion(String ref,
                                AminoAcidChange change)
        Normalize deletion AminoAcidChange for amino acid string Return change if it is not a clean deletion.
        Parameters:
        ref - reference amino acid string to change
        change - the AminoAcidChange to normalize
        Returns:
        normalized AminoAcidChange

      • truncateBothSides

        public static AminoAcidChange truncateBothSides(AminoAcidChange aaChange)
        Truncate AminoAcidChange from both sides for matching ref/alt prefixes/suffixes. Truncating of the prefixes is given higher priority to conform with the HGVS notation (you have to call shiftInsertion(de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference.AminoAcidChange, java.lang.String)) afterwards.
        Parameters:
        aaChange - AminoAcidChange to truncate
        Returns:
        updated AminoAcidChange

      • shiftInsertion

        public static AminoAcidChange shiftInsertion(AminoAcidChange aaChange,
                             String wtAASeq)
        Shift insertion AminoAcidChange to the right in WT AA sequence. Returns aaChange if aaChange.ref is not the empty string.
        Parameters:
        aaChange - AminoAcidChange to normalize
        wtAASeq - WT AA sequence to use for shifting
        Returns:
        updated AminoAcidChange
